author: AdrianoDee
body:
#### PR description:

This PR proposes the addition of the extra `BPix2->FPix2` (for pos and neg FPix) jumping connections in the CA pixel doublets These correspond to elements `(1,5)`and `(1,8)` in the CA numbering scheme. The cuts mimic the one we already have. And in order to test this the `*.406` Alpaka PixelOnly triplets wf is added to test it. This could be useful for the 14 FPix1 module failures. 

Leaving it has a draft for the moment. 

If this connection is not needed I would at least introduce the new wf removing the changes to the topology.

The 14_0_X backport is in #45479. 

#### PR validation:

Tested with `runTheMatrix.py -w upgrade -l 12834.406 `
title: Allowing Jumping BPix2->FPix2 For Pixel Doublets (and Alpaka Pixel Triplets `*.406` wf)
